text: how do I easily deploy my code on
AWS AWS has several Services which would
allow you to do this if you have a
three- tier web application you can
store your code in a g repository or an
S3 bucket and then use AWS elastic beant
stock to provision your ec2 instances
deplo your code onto them set up your
auto scaling groups configure your
elastic load balance and provision your
RDS
database if you are managing your own
ec2 instances you can use AWS code
commit to store and track changes in
your code AWS code deploy to deploy your
code onto the instances and AWS code
pipeline to manage the continuous
delivery of your
code if you're familiar with Chef you
can use AWS opsworks to configure your
code and any related dependencies in an
automated manner lastly to deploy your
infrastructure as code you can use AWS
cloud formation to do so
